title: Hlau suh ka awmpui che
lyrics:
"Hlau suh, ka awmpui che,"
Rangka eng zam hian,
Ropui chung siar ang
Ka kawng a rawn en.
Zan khawdur hnuaiah pawh
He tiamthu a eng;
"Ka kalsan lo vang che,
Malin i awm lo'ng" a ti.

Malin ka awm lo'ng }
Ka hnenah a awm, }
Aman min awmpui a tiam si } 2
Mah riakin ka awm ngai lo'ng }

Kan vel rose pangpar leh
Lili par an chuai;
Lei ni eng a ral hnuin,
Thangvan eng rii riai.
Isua, Saron par mawi,
Vul lai a chul lo;
Isua, chunglum lai ni,
Malin min kalsan lo vang.

Hmatiang hmuh lawk loh kawng,
Hlauhawm a hnai thei;
A hnai zawk Chhandamtu'n,
'Thlamuang rawh,' min ti.
Khua thal sirva te ang,
Lunglai ka lawm ta,
Hlimin ka zai zel ang,
'Min kalsan lo vang,' tiin.
